definition[0]: to shine in small bright flashes
example[0]: The sea sparkled in the sun.
definition[1]: if someone’s eyes sparkle, they seem to shine brightly, especially because the person is happy or excited
definition[2]: a bright shiny appearance, with small points of flashing light
definition[3]: a quality that makes something or someone seem interesting and full of life
example[4]: the sparkle and zest of a live performance
definition[4]: if someone has a sparkle in their eyes, their eyes seem to shine, and you can see a feeling in them, especially happiness or excitement
example[5]: There was a sparkle of fun in her brown eyes.
